title: I Think My Account Has Been Hacked
body:
My account has been permanently suspended it says please check the email address associated with your league of legend account.I checked my email and no email was sent.My Summoner name is: Meshan 45 if this is a mistake please remove the ban if not please send the email why.Pass on so hopefully a riot worker will see.
Note: I use razer cortex to boost fps

replies.body:
Hey there,

You'll have to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support if your account was locked for security reasons to begin the Account Recovery process.
